name: Semper Software
overview:
Semper Softwareâ€™s award winning technology provides IT-professionals with the critical ability to efficiently and cost-effectively recover PC and Server software from virtually any state back to a working state within minutes, all without deleting any user data.

Semper Software, the proven leader in Windows and Linux continuity management, is driving a transformation in the way organizations reduce the cost of managing and deploying their PC and Server populations. The company empowers customers, from SMBs to global enterprises, to manage an increasingly complex PC and Server ecosystem and meet the essential needs of maintaining software continuity in excess of 99.9% availability as an essential part of an overall business continuity strategy.

Designed for servers, desktops and laptops, Semper Softwareâ€™s award winning technology enables IT professionals to automatically recover PCs and Servers from virtually any state back to a working state within minutes, all without deleting any user data.

Reduces TCO of PCs and servers by 50% or more ROI in as little as 3 months Repair time to resolution of minutes, rather than hours or days
